structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 521, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 535, sec. 13, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). This section was amended by 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 521 and 535 which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
